scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Christopher carrying the Christ Child across a body of water. Saint Christopher, a large man with a beard, wears a blue tunic adorned with gold patterns and a red cloak draped over his shoulders. He holds a staff in his right hand and supports the Christ Child on his left shoulder. The Christ Child, depicted as a small infant, is raising his right hand in blessing and has a halo. The background shows a rocky landscape with trees and a body of water, suggesting an outdoor setting. The sky is blue with some stylized clouds and a prominent eye symbol, possibly representing divine oversight.
